title: Cadaveria ? Discography (2002-2007) [mp3@320]
description:
The extreme metal band Cadaveria was born in April 2001, forged by the erstwhile Opera IX personnel Cadaveria and Flegias, (a.k.a. MarÃƒÂ§elo Santos), the latter reverting back to his real name. The band signed to Scarlet Records for the opening 2002 album The Shadows&#039; Madame. Cadaveria and bassist Killer Bob would also be operational as singer for Industrialists Dynabyte. <a href="
